title: 303-C
statement: C. Minimum Modulartime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutYou have been givenndistinct integersa1,a2, ...,an. You can remove at mostkof them. Find the minimum modularm(m> 0), so that for every pair of the remaining integers(ai,aj), the following unequality holds:.InputThe first line contains two integersnandk(1  ≤n≤ 5000, 0 ≤k≤ 4), which we have mentioned above.The second line containsndistinct integersa1,a2, ...,an(0 ≤ai≤ 106).OutputPrint a single positive integer — the minimumm.ExamplesInput7 00 2 3 6 7 12 18Output13Input7 10 2 3 6 7 12 18Output7
